channel.title: I need these two cases made i have all the ids
channel.description:
i need two cases made one tro make a stall give u raw sharks so u can cook them on a range and the range i need one written so it gives u a cooked shark if u use uncooked on it well anyway here is the code u may need
cooked shark = 385 raw shark = 383 range = 411 food stall = 4875
plozx help me kay =] well hope someonecan help ill make u a mod on my serv if u want neway thankz...psot away =]

item.title: I need these two cases made i have all the ids
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Stall

case 4875: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)){ if(actionTimer == 0) { addItem(383, 1); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[17]), 17); sendMessage("You steal a raw shark"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x340); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

Range Cooking

if (useItemID == 383 && atObjectID == 411) { deleteItem(383, getItemSlot(383), 1); addItem(385, 1) addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[7]), 7); setAnimation(883); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Put the Food Stall in with other cases, like above case 299, or something. Put the Range Cooking under case 192 I believe.

Read full topic
